text: Megha Mittal (born 20 November 1976 in Marwar, India) is the former chairperson and managing director of the German fashion luxury brand Escada. The Mittal family sold its shareholding in Escada to Regent on 4 November 2019.Regent announces acquisition of Escada. Regent, L.P. 4 November 2019. Retrieved 10 April 2020. ==Education and career== Mittal graduated from the Wharton School of Business in 1997, with a B.S. in Economics with concentration in Finance. She subsequently joined the Investment Bank Goldman Sachs as an Analyst in the Research Department. In 2003, she obtained a Postgraduate Degree in Architectural Interior Design at the Inchbald School of Design in London. Mittal left Goldman Sachs after one year. In November 2009, she acquired Escada. == References == Category:Businesswomen from Rajasthan Category:Wharton School of the University of Pennsylvania alumni Category:Living people Category:1976 births Category:Indian expatriates in the United Kingdom Category:Indian businesspeople in fashion Category:Goldman Sachs people Megha
